author: desruisseaux
msg: Removed the .txt extension in CHANGES, HEADER and README files for consistency with LICENSE, NOTICE, KEYS and DEPENDENCIES (SIS-60).
Updated the content of other files in order to remove the .txt extension in their reference to the above-cited files.
This commit contains opportunist trimming of trailing spaces performed by the IDE editor.
